name: Entei
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 damage plus 20 more damage.
Attack2Text: Discard 2 Basic Energy cards attached to Entei or this attack does nothing.

name: Pidgeot
Ability1Text: Once during your turn (before your attack), if Pidgeot is your Active Pokemon, you may shuffle 1 of your Benched Pokemon and all cards attached to it into your deck. This power can't be used if Pidgeot is affected by a Special Condition.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 damage plus 30 more damage.

name: Raikou
Attack1Text: Your opponent switches the Defending Pokemon with 1 of his or her Benched Pokemon, if any.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If tails, Raikou does 20 damage to itself.

name: Suicune
Ability1Text: If Suicune is Burned or Poisoned by an opponent's attack (even if Suicune is Knocked Out), the Attacking Pokemon is now affected by the same Special Conditions (1 if there is only 1).
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

name: Tauros
Attack1Text: Does 10 damage plus 10 more damage for each damage counter on Tauros.

name: Venusaur
Attack1Text: Does 20 damage to 2 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)
Attack2Text: Venusaur can't use Hard Plant during your next turn.

name: Ivysaur
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Poisoned.

name: Multi Technical Machine 01
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

name: Cacnea
Attack1Text: If the Defending Pokemon tries to attack during your opponent's next turn, your opponent flips a coin. If tails, that attack does nothing.

name: Luvdisc
Attack1Text: If there are 2 Defending Pokemon in play, choose 1 of the Defending Pokemon. That Pokemon is now Paralyzed. (If there is only 1 Defending Pokemon, this attack does nothing.)
Attack2Text: Move 1 Energy card attached to the Defending Pokemon to the other Defending Pokemon. (Ignore this effect if your opponent has only 1 Defending Pokemon.)

name: Phanpy
Attack1Text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

name: Pikachu
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If tails, Pikachu does 10 damage to itself.

name: Celebi ex
Ability1Text: Once during your turn, when you put Celebi ex from your hand onto your Bench, you may search your discard pile for a card, show it to your opponent, and put it on top of your deck.
Attack1Text: Prevent all effects of attacks, including damage, done to Celebi ex by your opponent's Pokemon-ex during your opponent's next turn.
